name: cloudy days dishcloth
notes:
the cloudy days dishcloth uses the tiny cloud stitch to create a textured washcloth/dishcloth to use around the house.

this pattern uses 75 yards of a #4 medium-weight cotton yarn and a 4.5 mm crochet hook. 

a step by step video tutorial is available for this pattern: [tiny clouds dishcloth pattern][1]

> [subscribe to my newsletter][2] to be notified when new patterns come out

 [2]: https://subscribepage.io/mfhzxe
